item.title: How the Bible Brought Me to Bacon
item.author: thecogcatholic@outlook.com (Darren)
item.description: Bacon is a special gift from God – one of the tasty ways by which he tells us, “I love you.” I don’t have a Bible verse for that, but I’m convinced. In my case, bacon has been a healthful “diet food.” With its optimal fat-to-protein ratio, it played a role in my losing 40 pounds in three months. It was part of my dietary strategy – along with intermittent fasting – to reverse my type 2 diabetes.
